content: I collaborated with Victor at several projects at ASSIST Software and I must admit, he is one of the most professional and talented front-end engineers I had the pleasure to work with. His knowledge, curiosity and ambition are second to none - plus he's really passionate about training others, which is a extremely important skill nowadays. He has a strong work ethic and the ability to inspire others, I personally love working with him and I recommend him as a highly valuable team member.
